wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Kenneth Christie Cooper  (18 October 1905 – 4 September 1981) was a senior British Army officer who commanded 7th Armoured Division.

response: Born the son of Major General Kenneth Cooper and educated at Winchester College and at the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst, Cooper was commissioned into the Life Guards in 1956.
* Kenneth Cooper (1905–1981), British Army officer, lived at West End House
*Kenneth Cooper (British Army officer) (1905–1981), British Army major general
